mapper.insert: insert into user_manage_demo (id, name, password, type, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_delete) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{type}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified}, #{isDelete})
mapper.select: select id, name, password, type, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_delete from user_manage_demo where name = #{name} and password = #{password} and type = #{type}
select id, name, password, type, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_delete from user_manage_demo where type = #{type} AND is_delete = #{isDelete}
select id, name, password, type, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_delete from user_manage_demo where name = #{name} and type = #{type}
mapper.update: update user_manage_demo set is_delete = true, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified} where id = #{id}
